name: The spruce of life
description:
There's only one plant left on the planet. Like the proud robot that you are, you must protect it. (Or is this really the case? ) To do so, you will need to make your brain or more likely your processor work. 

Any ressemblance with Wall-E is purely a coincidence :wink: 

Controls : 
   -Move : AWSD / ZQSD / Arrows Keys (What else :smirk:) 
   -Grab : Right click
   -Look : Your mouse movement

Gamepad  :
   -Move : Left stick
   -Grab : RB
   -Look : Right stick
